returns._0: ID of Dispute in MediationService contract

params._changeOrderDetailsURI: details of Change Order on distributed file system
details of Change Order on distributed file system

returns._0: ID of Dispute in MediationService contract

params._settlementDetailsURI: details of Change Order on distributed file system

withdrawFees(address).details: transfers all releasable fees paid in native currency and ERC20 tokens

APPEAL_PERIOD().notice: time to appeal a MediationService decision after the decision has been rendered

CHANGE_ORDER_PERIOD().notice: time to approve a Change Order after it is created

activateProject(uint256).notice: Provider stakes in Escrow and begins working on ProjectTx fees paid on Project creation become non-refundable

appealDecision(uint256).notice: creates a new Dispute in MediationService contract with same details of original mediation casecan only called between rendering of original decision and end of APPEAL_PERIOD

approveChangeOrder(uint256).notice: closes Project and Escrow releases funds according to Change Order

approveProject(uint256).notice: Buyer approves, Project is closed and Escrow releases funds according to Project details

cancelProject(uint256).notice: Closes the Project and performs the following actions:   - Releases projectFee to Buyer from Escrow   - Refunds txFee to Buyer **Prerequisite:** Project must not be activated by the Provider

challengeProject(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Buyer challenges completed Project and proposes Change Order

completeProject(uint256).notice: Provider claims Project is complete and reviewPeriod is initiated

createProject(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: creates a Project in Marketplace and deploys an associated Escrow contract

discontinueProject(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Allows either Buyer or Provider to discontinue Project and propose a Change Order

disputeProject(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: initiates mediation by creating a Dispute in MediationService contractcan only be called after a Change Order has failed to be approved within CHANGE_ORDER_PERIOD

erc20Tokens(uint256).notice: ERC20 tokens which can be used as payment token for Projects

escrowWithdrawnEvent(uint256,address,uin.notice: called by Escrow after user withdraws

nebulaiTxFee().notice: transaction fee charged for creating projects in marketplace, represented as a percentage of project fee

proposeSettlement(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: creates a new Change Order during mediationcan only be created during Disclosure phase of mediationService dispute

receiveCommission(uint256,uint256).notice: called by Escrow after tranferring commission fee to Marketplace when Provider withdraws

resolveByMediation(uint256).notice: Closes project and Escrow releases funds according to Dispute in MediationService contractif Dispute is not appeal, user must wait until after APPEAL_PERIOD elapses

resolveDismissedCase(uint256).notice: closes Project and Escrow releases funds according to Project detailsDispute can be dismissed in MediationService contract if neither party pays mediation fee

reviewOverdue(uint256).notice: closes Project and Escrow releases funds according to Project detailscan only be called after reviewPeriod has elapsed and Buyer has not approved or challenged

waiveAppeal(uint256).notice: closes Project and Escrow releases funds according to Dispute in MediationService contractonly non-prevailing party may waive the appeal
